src:
Luhut Panggil Prabowo hingga Budi Karya, Bahas Apa?
07 Nov 2019, 10:11 by Achmad Dwi Afriyadi


Foto: Achmad Dwi Afriyadi



Foto: Achmad Dwi Afriyadi

Jakarta - Menteri Koordinator Bidang Kemaritiman dan Investasi Luhut Binsar Pandjaitan memanggil Menteri Pertahanan Prabowo Subianto ke kantornya sore ini. Prabowo tiba di Kantor Luhut sekitar pukul 16.50 WIB.Berdasarkan pantauan detikcom di lokasi, Kamis (7/11/2019) Prabowo mengenakan kemeja warna cokelat. Ia langsung masuk kantor Luhut begitu keluar dari mobil Alphard berplat 1-00.Masih belum jelas maksud kedatangan Prabowo ke Kantor Luhut. Namun, beberapa juga pejabat hadir.Sebut saja, Menteri Perhubungan Budi Karya Sumadi. Ia datang sebelum Prabowo sekitar pukul 16.30.Saat ditanya mengenai kenapa ia dipanggil Luhut, ia mengaku tidak tahu. Ia juga tak tahu apakah bakal membahas 'perceraian' Garuda Indonesia dan Sriwijaya Air yang kini tengah hangat."Nggak tahu," katanya.Selain itu, ada juga Direktur Utama Garuda Indonesia Ari Askhara yang hadir. Tapi, ia tak lewat lobi kantor Luhut melainkan pintu samping.Simak Video "Komentari Penusukan Wiranto, Luhut Pandjaitan: Jangan Dibesar-Besarkan"[Gambas:Video 20detik](eds/eds)
text:
Luhut Call Prabowo to Budi Karya, Discuss What?
07 Nov 2019, 10:11 by Achmad Dwi Afriyadi


Photo: Achmad Dwi Afriyadi



Photo: Achmad Dwi Afriyadi

Jakarta - Coordinating Minister for Maritime Affairs and Investment Luhut Binsar Pandjaitan summoned Defense Minister Prabowo Subianto to his office this afternoon. Prabowo arrived at the Luhut Office at around 16.50 West Indonesia Time. Based on AFP monitoring on location, Thursday (11/07/2019) Prabowo was wearing a brown shirt. He immediately entered Luhut's office as soon as he got out of the Alphard car with the template 1-00. However, several officials were also present. Call it, Minister of Transportation Budi Karya Sumadi. He arrived before Prabowo around 16:30. When asked about why he was called Luhut, he claimed not to know. He also did not know whether he would discuss the 'divorce' of Garuda Indonesia and Sriwijaya Air, which is now warm. "I don't know," he said. In addition, there was also Garuda Indonesia Managing Director Ari Askhara present. But, he did not pass through Luhut's office lobby but a side door. Watch Video "Wiranto's Stabbing Commentary, Luhut Pandjaitan: Don't Be Exaggerated" [Gambas: Video 20seconds] (eds / eds)
